channel.title: CVE Feed for ServiceNow -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ServiceNow -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-3414|2023-07-26T18:20:18.253Z -- servicenow -- jenkins%20plug-in%20for%20servicenow%20devops
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability exists in versions of the Jenkins Plug-in for ServiceNow DevOps prior to 1.38.1 that, if exploited successfully, could cause the unwanted exposure of sensitive information.Â To address this issue, apply the 1.38.1 version of the Jenkins plug-in for ServiceNow DevOps on your Jenkins server. No changes are required on your instances of the Now Platform.
